thread.section_title: eEuroparts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eEuroparts.com | www.eeuroparts.com | 2 of 331
thread.title: Ryan Harrington

author: Ryan Harrington
title: Ryan Harrington
text:
Eeuro is always the first (and the only place) I have to look for to find what I am looking for my classic Saab 900 and Volvo 240. You guys always have what I need, with a great selection of OEM parts at a price that's hard to beat. Shipping is always fast and out of all the times I've ordered parts online I have only had to call customer service two or three times, with that said though the issues were always minor and resolved within one phone call! The customer service representatives are always friendly and very helpful to talk to.
All in all my favorite website to shop at, and I recommend the site to everyone for all their European car needs!
